Description.Name: Improved Swarm LRM Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Improved Swarm missiles that mimic the splash damage capability of artillery shells with greater accuracy than Swarm missiles, homing in only on nearby enemies when they miss their intended target.

Improved Swarm LRM ammo bins hold the same number of shots per ton as standard LRM ammunition bins. This half-capacity bin contains 60 rounds.
